page.title: 19FAIRY BROW
page.content: According to legend, there is a haunted graveyard in the village of Little Bollington.A mound of land belonging to Stamford farm lying near the river Bollin became the site of some archeological interest recently. Members of a local archeological group made an exploratory excavation.A single-riveted tanged dagger was found.This is 17cm long and is said to date from the Bronze Age.Those working on the site reported an overpowering smell of liniment associated with berial.Who knows what further excavation will reveal?.Now, in the summer 1985,the site is peaceful,with only the heard of cows to disturb this ancient site.
